theorem.name: belList_app

text.english: \(\texttt{false}\) is the identity element of \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{false} \vee b = b \]
text.italiano: Interazione fra \(\texttt{belList}\) e \(\texttt{app}\), i.e. \begin{gather*} \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A . \; \forall b \in A. \\ \texttt{belList}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2),b) = \\ \texttt{belList}(l_1,b) \vee \texttt{belList}(l_2,b) \end{gather*}

theorem.coq:
Theorem belList_app: forall l1 l2 : list , forall b : A , belList (app l1 l2) b = belList l1 b || belList l2 b.
Proof.
Admitted.
